findings.message:
bVault.withdraw(uint256) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#386-411) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-r = (balance().mul(_shares)).div(totalSupply()) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#390)
	-fee = r.mul(feeRatio).div(feeMax) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#406)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
bVault.deposit(uint256) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#359-377) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply() == 0 (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#367)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
bVault.getPricePerFullShare() (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#425-430) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply() == 0 (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#426)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
bVault.setFeeRatio(uint256[3]) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#432-439) should emit an event for: 
	- fee1 = fees[0] (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#436) 
	- fee2 = fees[1] (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#437) 
	- fee3 = fees[2] (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#438)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
bVault.setMin(uint256) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#324-327) should emit an event for: 
	- min = _min (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#326)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
Reentrancy in bVault.deposit(uint256) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#359-377):
	External calls:
	- token.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#363)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#372)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].add(amount) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#116)
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#372)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#115)
	- userDepoistTime[msg.sender] = now (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#373)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in bVault.deposit(uint256) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#359-377):
	External calls:
	- token.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#363)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(address(0),account,amount) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#117)
		- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#372)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
bVault.getFeeRatio() (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#413-423) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- t > 604800 (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#416)
	- t > 86400 (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#419)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
bVault.withdraw(uint256) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#386-411) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)((now - userDepoistTime[msg.sender]) > depositWithdrawInterval,Deposit and withdraw must be 60 seconds apart!) (../..0x3ec4a6cfe803ee84009ce6e1ecf419c9cb1e8af0.sol#388)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
